body:
Seeing several of the tests in ./pkg/cloudprovider/providers/gce flake 1 in 5-10 runs when run locally (I am logged in to gcloud).  Is it possible one of the APIs is not correctly shimmed and is fetching real data?

```
go test ./pkg/cloudprovider/providers/gce/ -test.run=TestEnsureInternalBackendServiceGroups/GetRegionBackendService_failed -count=10
--- FAIL: TestEnsureInternalBackendServiceGroups (0.00s)
    --- FAIL: TestEnsureInternalBackendServiceGroups/GetRegionBackendService_failed (0.00s)
    	gce_loadbalancer_internal_test.go:139:
    			Error Trace:	gce_loadbalancer_internal_test.go:139
    			Error:      	Not equal:
    			            	expected: []*compute.Backend{(*compute.Backend)(0xc420316e10), (*compute.Backend)(0xc420316ea0)}
    			            	actual  : []*compute.Backend{(*compute.Backend)(0xc420317290)}

    			            	Diff:
    			            	--- Expected
    			            	+++ Actual
    			            	@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
    			            	-([]*compute.Backend) (len=2) {
    			            	+([]*compute.Backend) (len=1) {
    			            	  (*compute.Backend)({
    			            	@@ -5,16 +5,3 @@
    			            	   Description: (string) "",
    			            	-  Group: (string) (len=15) "new-test-node-1",
    			            	-  MaxConnections: (int64) 0,
    			            	-  MaxConnectionsPerInstance: (int64) 0,
    			            	-  MaxRate: (int64) 0,
    			            	-  MaxRatePerInstance: (float64) 0,
    			            	-  MaxUtilization: (float64) 0,
    			            	-  ForceSendFields: ([]string) <nil>,
    			            	-  NullFields: ([]string) <nil>
    			            	- }),
    			            	- (*compute.Backend)({
    			            	-  BalancingMode: (string) "",
    			            	-  CapacityScaler: (float64) 0,
    			            	-  Description: (string) "",
    			            	-  Group: (string) (len=15) "new-test-node-2",
    			            	+  Group: (string) (len=118) "https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/test-project/zones/us-central1-b/instanceGroups/k8s-ig--test-cluster-id",
    			            	   MaxConnections: (int64) 0,
    			Test:       	TestEnsureInternalBackendServiceGroups/GetRegionBackendService_failed
FAIL
FAIL	k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/gce	0.042s
```

@kubernetes/sig-cloud-provider-bugs

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Cloud Provider.
labels.name: sig/cloud-provider

title: io/kubernetes/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/gce EnsureInternalBackendServiceGroups/GetRegionBackendService_failed is flaky
